Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is the first of three in the series.
A group has just targeted an army base, and have stolen one and a half truckloads of military weapons, and kidnapped three soldiers including Kathie Peck, the girlfriend of Sargent Joe Armstrong (Joe) (Dudikoff).
